name: Pumpkin Bread
ingredients: 1 large (29 oz.) can pumpkin 1½ tsp. salt
steps: I have played around with this recipe for years, and now I think I have finally got it right. The secret to the texture
of this bread is the amount of pumpkin.
I like to use 3 greased medium loaf pans. Bake at 350° for 45-­‐55 minutes, depending on your oven.
I love this recipe as muffins too! Just add cream cheese frosting (in the Dessert section).
